site.title: Does the rolling blackout plan affect your municipality?
site.introduction:
Due to reduced power production, Belgium may encounter power shortages this winter. To mitigate a complete power failure, the Belgian Government has announced a rolling blackout plan, in which parts of municipalities and districts are temporarily cut off from power at a known time. These cut offs are grouped in sections, which you can select below. If your municipality is not dark green, you may experience a couple of hours without electricity. To see details per district, just select your municipality on the map.
Update: The rolling blackout plan contains a geographical imbalance. To correct this imbalance, the plan was recently adjusted. We did not take this correction into account during the creation of the map. View the article in dutch or in french.

info-panel.title: Select your municipality on the map
info-panel.subtitle: ... to see how many power distribution cabinets are included in the rolling blackout plan.
info-panel.sentence-3: are included in the rolling blackout plan.
